meta.content: NNPS is an award-winning school system, the largest on the Virginia Peninsula. Each day in Newport News Public Schools we focus on one mission: ensuring that all students graduate college, career and citizen-ready.

div.p: Visit NNPS-TV online. See our programming on Cox 47, Verizon Fios 17; via live stream on Roku, Apple TV, and on the web at nnpstv.com/webstream.
